svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/53.0.2767.4 Safari/537.36" version="5.5.3.1" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div: samples are popped from incoming queue and placed into arraysfilled buffer of value arrays (may be less than num_samples for nonblocking)

switch.text:
samples are popped from incoming queue and placed into arrays
filled buffer of value arrays (may be less than num_samples for nonblocking)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

div.div: input queue initialized (defaults to ~100ms worth of samples at default rate)

switch.text: input queue initialized (defaults to ~100ms worth of samples at default rate)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
div.div:
handle_in_transfer() running in USB thread pushing sample values into the queue
exception thrown if queue overflows (reading data isn't keeping up)

switch.text:
handle_in_transfer() running in USB thread pushing sample values into the queue
exception thrown if queue overflows (reading data isn't keeping up)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
6. read(buffer, num_samples, timeout)
buffer: vector of arrays containing all 4 signal values
timeout: defaults to 0 (nonblocking), otherwise ms to wait

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
div.div:
noncontinuous mode: when num_samples is reached USB transfers
are halted

switch.text:
noncontinuous mode: when num_samples is reached USB transfers
are halted

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
control returns to session once all devices
have reached the set sample limit

switch.text:
control returns to session once all devices
have reached the set sample limit

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
div.div:
channels are disabled
firmware state is reset

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
